title: Three Words: Exploding Hammer Festival
itunes:title: Three Words: Exploding Hammer Festival
description:
Anthony, Gregg, and Erica RISKED THEIR LIVES for this podcast. The studio may be closed, but nothing, not even a quarantine, could stop JRVP. Recorded from Anthony's penthouse, they discuss life on lockdown, blood dripping down walls, Smurf festivals, and a "beautiful story". Gregg pitches Comedy Central on sending JRVP to Mexico for an exploding hammer festival.
This episode is brought to you by Manscaped (visit Manscaped.com, enter code VANITY at checkout).
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
